content:
Very Important to know how to access the SDOH-CC IG

This is the "MOST CURRENT" build which is available for viewing out of the Trifolia System.
https://trifolia-fhir-dev.lantanagroup.com/igs/lantana_prod_hapi_r4/SDOH-CC/index.html

We may try to do some IG Builds during the course of the Connectathon. This is the link to Build.FHIR.org: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/sdoh-cc/
